data_table.description: Form 145 - Observational Study (OS) Follow-Up Questionnaire (Year 5) -- current weight, recent weight change; current physical activity and exercise (frequency, duration); current smoking; video, video display terminal exposure; depression scale; frequency religious practices; recent use of alternative medical treatments; current dental health, frequency of professional dental care; recent use of hormone replacement therapy; diagnoses of new medical conditions; current marital status.

variable.name: WTCUR_5
variable.comment: What is your current weight?

variable.name: WTMAX_5
variable.comment: In the past year, what was your highest weight?

variable.name: WTMIN_5
variable.comment: In the past year, what was your lowest weight?

variable.name: WALKSWK_5
variable.comment: Think about the walking you do outside the home. How often do you walk outside the home for more than 10 minutes without stopping? (Mark only one.)

variable.name: MINSWALK_5
variable.comment: When you walk outside the home for more than 10 minutes without stopping, for how many minutes do you usually walk? Sub-question of F145 V1 Q4 'Walk more than 10 minutes'.

variable.name: WALKSPD_5
variable.comment: What is your usual speed? Sub-question of F145 V1 Q4 'Walk more than 10 minutes'.

variable.name: HDEXFREQ_5
variable.comment: STRENUOUS OR VERY HARD EXERCISE (You work up a sweat and your heart beats fast). For example, aerobics, aerobic dancing, jogging, tennis, swimming laps.

variable.name: HARDMINS_5
variable.comment: How long do usually exercise like this at one time? Sub-question of F145 V1 Q5.1 'Strenuous exercise'.

variable.name: MDEXFREQ_5
variable.comment: MODERATE EXERCISE (Not exhausting). For example, biking outdoors, use of an exercise machine (like a stationary bike or treadmill), calisthenics, easy swimming, popular and folk dancing.

variable.name: MODMINS_5
variable.comment: How long do usually exercise like this at one time? Sub-question of F145 V1 Q5.3 'Moderate exercise'.

variable.name: MLEXFREQ_5
variable.comment: MILD EXERCISE. For example, slow dancing, bowling, golf.

variable.name: MILDMINS_5
variable.comment: How long do usually exercise like this at one time? Sub-question of F145 V1 Q5.5 'Mild exercise'.

variable.name: SMOKENW_5
variable.comment: Do you smoke cigarettes now?

variable.name: CIGSDAY_5
variable.comment: How many cigarettes do you usually smoke each day? (Mark one.) Sub-question of F145 V1 Q6 'Smoke cigarettes now'.

variable.name: COMPUTER_5
variable.description: Sit in front of computer screen
variable.comment: In the past four years, did you ever sit in front of a computer screen within three feet with the power turned 'on' (for example, when writing letters)?

variable.name: COMPDYWK_5
variable.comment: In the past four years, what was the average number of days each week that you sat in front of a computer screen with the power turned 'on'? (Mark one.) Sub-question of F145 V1 Q7 'Computer screen'.

variable.name: COMPHRDY_5
variable.comment:
On the days that you used a computer, what was the average number of hours that you sat in front of a computer screen with the power turned 'on'? (Mark one.) Sub-question of F145 V1 Q7 'Computer screen'.
Sub-question of F145 V1 Q7.1 'Days each week computer screen'.

variable.name: REASLIVG_5
variable.description: I have a reason for living
variable.comment: I have a reason for living.

variable.name: SENSPURP_5
variable.description: I feel purpose in my life
variable.comment: I feel a sense of purpose in my life.

variable.name: DOWNDEEP_5
variable.description: Able to reach down for comfort
variable.comment: I am able to reach down deep into myself for comfort

variable.name: HARMONY_5
variable.comment: I feel a sense of harmony within myself.

variable.name: COMFAITH_5
variable.comment: I find a comfort in my faith.

variable.name: STRFAITH_5
variable.comment: I find strength in my faith.

variable.name: RELGSERV_5
variable.comment: In the past year, how often did you attend regular religious services?

variable.name: RELGPRIV_5
variable.comment: In the past year, how often did you spend time in private religious activities such as prayer, meditation, bible reading, or reading religious literature?

variable.name: NONTRDMD_5
variable.comment: In the past year, have you used a non-traditional or alternative medicine treatment or technique, such as herbal remedies, mental imagery, spiritual healing, acupressure, acupuncture, or homeopathy?

variable.name: TEETHCND_5
variable.comment: How would you describe the condition of your mouth and teeth?

variable.name: DRYMOUTH_5
variable.comment: Does your mouth feel dry when you eat a meal?

variable.name: TEETHPRB_5
variable.comment: How often have you limited the kinds or amounts of food you eat because of problems with your teeth or dentures?

variable.name: VISITDNT_5
variable.comment: During the past 3 years, how often have you gone to the dentist or dental hygienist for routine check-ups or cleanings?
variable.value: I have not gone in past three years

variable.name: GUMDIS_5
variable.comment: Has a dentist or dental hygienist ever told you that you had periodontal or gum disease?

variable.name: NOTEETH_5
variable.comment: Have you lost ALL of your permanent teeth, both upper and lower?

variable.name: NATHOR_5
variable.comment: In the past year, did you use any natural hormones that you can get without a doctor's prescription? These are usually made from plants and often obtained from health food stores or by mail order. They may be in the form of a pill, vaginal cream or suppository, or skin cream.

variable.name: YAMCRM_5
variable.comment: Wild yam or progesterone creams Sub-question of F145 V1 Q17 'Natural hormones in past year'.

variable.name: YAMPLS_5
variable.comment: Sub-question of F145 V1 Q17 'Natural hormones in past year'.

variable.name: PRGSUP_5
variable.comment: Progesterone suppositories Sub-question of F145 V1 Q17 'Natural hormones in past year'.

variable.name: DHEAPL_5
variable.comment: DHEA (dehydroepiandosterone pills) Sub-question of F145 V1 Q17 'Natural hormones in past year'.

variable.name: PHYPLS_5
variable.comment: Phytoestrogen pills (soy or flax) Sub-question of F145 V1 Q17 'Natural hormones in past year'.

variable.name: PHYCRM_5
variable.comment: Phytoestrogen creams (soy or flax) Sub-question of F145 V1 Q17 'Natural hormones in past year'.

variable.name: PHYFDS_5
variable.comment: Phytoestrogen containing foods (tofu, soybeans) Sub-question of F145 V1 Q17 'Natural hormones in past year'.

variable.name: NTOTHR_5
variable.comment: Sub-question of F145 V1 Q17 'Natural hormones in past year'.

variable.name: NTDNTK_5
variable.comment: Sub-question of F145 V1 Q17 'Natural hormones in past year'.

variable.name: HRPST1YR_5
variable.comment: In the past year, did you use female hormones (ESTROGEN or PROGESTERONE) that were prescribed by a doctor? (This may have been in the form of a pill, skin patch, shot, or vaginal cream or suppository.)

variable.name: EPPL_5
variable.comment: In the past year, did you use female hormone PILLS prescribed by a doctor which contained both ESTROGEN and progestin (PROGESTERONE) COMBINED in the same pill or package (for example, Prempro, Premphase)? (Do not include use of two separate estrogen and progestin pills used at the same time.) Sub-question of F145 V1 Q18 'Used female hormones/past year'.

variable.name: EPDUR_5
variable.comment:
In the past year, how many months did you use COMBINED female hormone PILLS which contained both ESTROGEN and PROGESTIN? Sub-question of F145 V1 Q18 'Used female hormones/past year'.
Sub-question of F145 V1 Q19 'Combined estr/progest pills'.

variable.name: ETPL_5
variable.comment: In the past year, did you use female hormone PILLS prescribed by a doctor which contained both ESTROGEN and TESTOSTERONE COMBINED in the same pill (for example, Estratest)? Sub-question of F145 V1 Q18 'Used female hormones/past year'.

variable.name: ETDUR_5
variable.comment:
In the past year, how many months did you use COMBINED female hormone PILLS which contained both ESTROGEN and TESTOSTERONE? Sub-question of F145 V1 Q18 'Used female hormones/past year'.
Sub-question of F145 V1 Q20 'Combined estr/testost pills'.

variable.name: ETTYPE_5
variable.comment:
In the past year, what type of COMBINED ESTROGEN and TESTOSTERONE pill did you use the longest? Sub-question of F145 V1 Q18 'Used female hormones/past year'.
Sub-question of F145 V1 Q20 'Combined estr/testost pills'.

variable.name: EPL_5
variable.comment: In the past year, did you use ESTROGEN PILLS which were prescribed by a doctor (for example, Premarin, Estrace, Ogen)? (Do not include the combined pill of estrogen progestin or the combined pill of estrogen and testosterone.) Sub-question of F145 V1 Q18 'Used female hormones/past year'.

variable.name: EPLDUR_5
variable.comment:
In the past year, how many months did you use ESTROGEN PILLS? Sub-question of F145 V1 Q18 'Used female hormones/past year'.
Sub-question of F145 V1 Q21 'Used estrogen pills'.

variable.name: EPLDAYS_5
variable.comment:
In the past year, when you were using ESTROGEN pills, what was the average number of days each month you used the pills? Sub-question of F145 V1 Q18 'Used female hormones/past year'.
Sub-question of F145 V1 Q21 'Used estrogen pills'.

variable.name: EPLTYPE_5
variable.comment:
In the past year, what type of ESTROGEN pills did you use the longest? Sub-question of F145 V1 Q18 'Used female hormones/past year'.
Sub-question of F145 V1 Q21 'Used estrogen pills'.

variable.name: EPLDOSE_5
variable.comment:
What dose did you usually take each day? (Mark one. If you regularly take more than one dose, mark the lowest dose.) Sub-question of F145 V1 Q18 'Used female hormones/past year'.
Sub-question of F145 V1 Q21 'Used estrogen pills'.

variable.name: ESHT_5
variable.comment: In the past year, did you take shots containing the hormone ESTROGEN? Sub-question of F145 V1 Q18 'Used female hormones/past year'.

variable.name: ESHTDUR_5
variable.comment:
In the past year, how many months did you take the shots? (Count each shot as one month.) Sub-question of F145 V1 Q18 'Used female hormones/past year'.
Sub-question of F145 V1 Q22 'Took estrogen shots'.

variable.name: ECRM_5
variable.comment: In the past year, did you use a vaginal cream or suppository containing ESTROGEN which was prescribed by a doctor? Sub-question of F145 V1 Q18 'Used female hormones/past year'.

variable.name: ECRMDUR_5
variable.comment:
In the past year, how many months did you use the vaginal cream or suppository? Sub-question of F145 V1 Q18 'Used female hormones/past year'.
Sub-question of F145 V1 Q23 'Used estrogen vaginally'.

variable.name: EPCH_5
variable.comment:
In the past year, did you use a SKIN PATCH containing the hormone ESTROGEN with or without PROGESTERONE (for example, Estraderm, Climara, Vivelle)? Sub-question of F145 V1 Q18 'Used female hormones/past year'.
On forms 146-148 this variable reflects non-combination estrogen use only.

variable.name: EPCHDUR_5
variable.comment:
In the past year, how many months did you use the patch? Sub-question of F145 V1 Q18 'Used female hormones/past year'.
Sub-question of F145 V1 Q24 'Used estrogen skin patch'.

variable.name: EPCHTYPE_5
variable.comment:
In the past year, what type of patch did you use the longest? Sub-question of F145 V1 Q18 'Used female hormones/past year'.
Sub-question of F145 V1 Q24 'Used estrogen skin patch'.

variable.name: EPCHDOSE_5
variable.comment:
What dose of ESTROGEN was in the skin patch you usually used? Sub-question of F145 V1 Q18 'Used female hormones/past year'.
Sub-question of F145 V1 Q24 'Used estrogen skin patch'.

variable.name: EPCHCHNG_5
variable.comment:
What was the average number of times each week that you changed your skin patch? Sub-question of F145 V1 Q18 'Used female hormones/past year'.
Sub-question of F145 V1 Q24 'Used estrogen skin patch'.

variable.name: PPL_5
variable.comment: In the past year, did you use the female hormone PILL called PROGESTERONE or progestin (for example, Provera, Cycrin, Aman, Megace)? (Do not included the combined pill of estrogen and progestin.) Sub-question of F145 V1 Q18 'Used female hormones/past year'.

variable.name: PPLDUR_5
variable.comment:
In the past year, how many months did you use PROGESTERONE or progestin pills? Sub-question of F145 V1 Q18 'Used female hormones/past year'.
Sub-question of F145 V1 Q25 'Used progesterone pills'.

variable.name: PPLDAY_5
variable.comment:
In the past year, when you were using PROGESTERONE or progestin pills, what was the average number of days each month you used the pills? Sub-question of F145 V1 Q18 'Used female hormones/past year'.
Sub-question of F145 V1 Q25 'Used progesterone pills'.

variable.name: PPLTYPE_5
variable.comment:
In the past year, what type of PROGESTERONE or progestin pills did you use the longest? Sub-question of F145 V1 Q18 'Used female hormones/past year'.
Sub-question of F145 V1 Q25 'Used progesterone pills'.

variable.name: PPLDOSE_5
variable.comment:
What dose did you usually take each day? (Mark one. If you regularly take more than one dose, mark the lowest dose). Sub-question of F145 V1 Q18 'Used female hormones/past year'.
Sub-question of F145 V1 Q25 'Used progesterone pills'.

variable.name: MACDEGNR_5
variable.comment: Macular degeneration of the retina

variable.name: EMPHYSEM_5
variable.comment: Emphysema or chronic bronchitis

variable.name: CHF_5
variable.comment: Heart failure or congestive heart failure

variable.name: ANGINA_5
variable.comment: Angina (chest pains from the heart)

variable.name: KIDNEYST_5
variable.comment: Kidney or bladder stones (renal or urinary calculi)

variable.name: KIDDIALY_5
variable.comment: Dialysis for kidney or renal failure

variable.name: PANCREAT_5
variable.comment: Pancreatitis (inflamed pancreas)

variable.name: LIVRDIS_5
variable.comment: Liver disease (chronic active hepatitis, cirrhosis, or yellow jaundice)

variable.name: ALS_5
variable.comment: Amyotropic Lateral Sclerosis (ALS, motor neuron disease, or Lou Gehrig's disease)

variable.name: MARITAL_5
variable.comment: What is your current marital status? (Mark the one that best describes you.)

variable.name: TEPIWK_5
variable.description: Episodes recreational phys activity per week
variable.comment: Computed from Form 145, questions 4, 5.1, 5.3, and 5.5. Total number of episodes per week of recreational physical activity (includes walking, mild, moderate and strenuous physical activity).

variable.name: LEPITOT_5
variable.description: Episodes recreational phys activity per week >= 20 Min
variable.comment: Computed from Form 145, questions 4, 4.1, 5.1, 5.2, 5.3, 5.4, 5.5 and 5.6. Episodes per week of recreational physical activity of >=20 minutes duration (includes walking, mild, moderate and strenuous physical activity).

variable.name: MSEPIWK_5
variable.description: Episodes moderate to strenuous phys activity per week
variable.comment: Computed from Form 145, questions 4.2, 5.1, and 5.3. Episodes per week of moderate and strenuous recreational physical activity (includes walking fairly fast or very fast, moderate physical activity and strenuous physical activity).

variable.name: XLMSEPI_5
variable.description: Episodes moderate to strenuous activity >= 20 min/week
variable.comment: Computed from Form 145, questions 4, 4.1, 4.2, 5.1, 5.2, 5.3 and 5.4. Episodes per week of moderate and strenuous recreational physical activity of >=20 minutes duration (includes walking fairly fast or very fast, moderate physical activity and strenuous physical activity).

variable.name: LMSEPI_5
variable.description: Episodes moderate to strenuous activity >=20 min/week (categorical)
variable.comment: Computed from Form 145, questions 4, 4.1, 4.2, 5.1, 5.2, 5.3, and 5.4. Categorical variable of episodes per week of moderate and strenuous recreational physical activity of >= 20 minutes duration (includes walking fairly fast or very fast, moderate physical activity and strenuous physical activity). Computed from XLMSEPI and TEPIWK.

variable.name: SEPIWK_5
variable.comment: Computed from Form 145, question 5.1. Episodes per week of strenuous recreational physical activity.

variable.name: TMINWK_5
variable.description: Minutes of recreational phys activity per week
variable.comment: Computed from Form 145, questions 4, 4.1, 5.1, 5.2, 5.3, 5.4, 5.5, and 5.6. Total minutes per week of recreational physical activity (includes walking, mild, moderate and strenuous physical activity).

variable.name: MSMINWK_5
variable.description: Minutes of moderate to strenuous activity per week
variable.comment: Computed from Form 145, questions 4, 4.2, 5.1, and 5.3. Minutes per week of moderate and strenuous recreational physical activity (includes walking fairly fast or very fast, moderate physical activity and strenuous physical activity).

variable.name: SMINWK_5
variable.description: Minutes of strenuous phys activity per week
variable.comment: Computed from Form 145, questions 5.1 and 5.2. Minutes per week of strenuous recreational physical activity.

variable.name: TEXPWK_5
variable.description: Total energy expended from recreational phys. activity (MET-hours/week)
variable.comment: Computed from Form 145, questions 4, 4.1, 4.2, 5.1, 5.2, 5.3, 5.4, 5.5, and 5.6. Total MET-hours per week. Expenditure of energy from recreational physical activity (includes walking, mild, moderate and strenuous physical activity in kcal/week/kg).

variable.name: WALKEXP_5
variable.comment: Computed from Form 145, questions 4, 4.1, and 4.2. Expenditure of energy from physical activity from walking in kcal/week/kg (MET-hours per week).

variable.name: AVWKEXP_5
variable.comment: Computed from Form 145, questions 4, 4.1 and 4.2. Energy expenditure from average walking (2-3 mph) in MET-hours per week. If question 6.2 (speed of walking) was marked as 'don't know' or was missing, the speed was assumed to be 2-3 mph.

variable.name: FFWKEXP_5
variable.description: Energy expend from walking fairly fast (MET-hours/week)
variable.comment: Computed from Form 145, questions 4, 4.1 and 4.2. Energy expenditure form walking fairly fast (3-4 mph) in MET-hours per week.

variable.name: VFWKEXP_5
variable.description: Energy expend from walking very fast (MET-hours/week)
variable.comment: Computed from Form 145, questions 4, 4.1, and 4.2. Energy expenditure from walking very fast (> 4 mph) in MET-hours per week.

variable.name: HARDEXP_5
variable.comment: Computed from Form 145, questions 5.1 and 5.2. Energy expenditure from strenuous or very hard exercise (for example, aerobics, aerobic dancing, jogging, tennis, swimming laps) in MET-hours per week.

variable.name: MODEXP_5
variable.comment: Computed from Form 145, questions 5.3 and 5.4. Energy expenditure from moderate exercise (for example, biking outdoors, using an exercise machine, calisthenics, easy swimming, popular or folk dancing) in MET-hours per week.

variable.name: MILDEXP_5
variable.comment: Computed from Form 145, questions 5.5 and 5.6. Energy expenditure from mild exercise (for example, slow dancing, bowling, golf) in MET-hours per week.

variable.name: EST_5
variable.comment: Computed from form 150 questions 4, 5, 6, 7, 7.1, and 7.2

variable.name: PRG_5
variable.comment: Computed from form 150 questions 4, 5, 8, and 8.1

variable.name: HRT_5
variable.description: Hormone use last year (estrogen or progesterone)
variable.comment: Computed from variables 'Estrogen use last year' and 'Progesterone use last year'.
